api_list.name: my-ip_copy
api_list.description: showing the ip address of the user
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://show-ip.p.rapidapi.com/my-ip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "show-ip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
